titleStmt.title: A poem upon His Majesties coronation the 23. of April 1661. being St. Georges day.
titleStmt.author: Evelyn, John, 1620-1706, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Gabriel Bedel and Thomas Collins, near the Middle-Temple-Gate,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
